assessments.status_rationale: The measurement window (2025-11-18 to 2025-12-13) has not begun; no performance comparison evidence today.
No CAISO load reports cited; headlines do not mention peak loads reaching 33,000 MW.
No report of VVIX closing at or above 105.0 in today’s news; deadline remains open.
No clear evidence of the U.S. 2Y yield closing at or below 4.65% in today’s coverage.
The KEV addition window (2025-12-01 to 2025-12-15) has not started; no CISA updates referenced.
No OFAC press release on Russia-related designations is mentioned in today’s news.
No EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report details cited showing a ≥3.0 million barrel distillate draw.
No announcements from Google, Meta, Microsoft, or Amazon about new or expanded subsea cables were reported.
The performance window has begun, but there is no evidence yet of SOXX underperforming SPY by ≥2.5 pp.
No weekly Initial Claims release today indicating a print ≥235,000; deadline remains open.
No report of Henry Hub front-month settling at or below $3.10/MMBtu.
No evidence that the 5Y TIPS real yield closed at or below 1.80%.
